text: Hello! I have a basic 1-column email template set up, but when I insert an image (that happens to be wider than the standard 600px) in the WYSIWYG, it expands the whole body width of the email. Has anyone else had an issue with this? Thank you!
Hii, Its taking its image original size thats why it expands and became wider than the standard. you have to set width 100% or you can also change the original image size.
